title: Business: what's it all about?
brief_description: This film presents the operations of four different companies relating to basic business functions, problems, skills needed and the importance of business in everyday life. Shows that certain concepts are common to any business such as profit, the distinction between products and services, research and development, production and manufacturing marketing and distribution. Suitable for upper secondary level.
